name: Home EV Charger Federal Tax Credit
description: 30% tax credit up to $1,000 for installing EV charger at home in eligible areas; must install before June 30, 2026
fullDescription: The federal 30C tax credit provides a 30% tax credit for installing electric vehicle charging equipment at home, available in eligible low-income and rural census tracts.
whatTheyOffer:
- 30% tax credit on EV charger installation
- Up to $1,000 maximum credit
- Covers charger equipment and installation
- Available in eligible census tracts
- Reduces federal income tax owed
- Applies to primary and secondary homes
howToGetIt:
1. Check if your address is in eligible census tract
2. Use Rewiring America eligibility map tool
3. Purchase and install EV charging equipment
4. Keep all receipts and documentation
5. File IRS Form 8911 with tax return
6. Credit reduces your tax liability
keywords: 30C, EV charger, federal tax credit, 30%, $1000, IRS Form 8911, Rewiring America, installation
